wikipedia_page.main: Harry Cranbrook Allen  (23 March 1917 – 21 June 1998) was a prominent British historian of the United States.

link_mentions.page: List of people educated at Bedford School
response: *Professor Harry Cranbrook Allen MC FRHS (1917–1998), Fellow and Tutor in Modern History, Lincoln College, Oxford, 1946–1955, and Commonwealth Fund Professor of American History, University College London, 1955–1971Obituary, The Times, 20 July 1998, p.23
*Harry Cranbrook Allen, 81, British historian of the United States.
